articles.title: Solar storm threat for Earth continues amid NOAA satellites detecting sunspot decay - HT Tech
articles.description: NOAA satellites have spotted a decay in the magnetic field of sunspot AR3311. As a result, it has reduced the chances of an X-class solar flare eruption from 30% to 20%. However, it may be too early to write off the solar storm threat.
articles.content: Yesterday, it was reported that a highly unstable sunspot, AR3311, which was responsible for an X-class solar flare eruption last week, has now entered the full view of Earth. The National Oceanic an… [+2005 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: 650-foot asteroid dashing towards Earth! NASA tracks this monstrous space rock - HT Tech
articles.description: A colossal 650-feet wide asteroid is set to make its closest approach towards Earth today, NASA has revealed. Does it pose any danger to the planet?
articles.content: Despite asteroids passing Earth closely almost every day, none so far have threatened our safety on Earth. But there isn't any guarantee against any space rock striking Earth. How big an asteroid wou… [+1982 chars]

articles.title: Ford to keep AM radio in cars after pressure from lawmakers - TechCrunch
articles.description: Owners of Ford's Mustang Mach-E and F-150 Lightning without AM radio capability will receive a software update, says CEO Jim Farley.
articles.content:
Ford has reversed its decision to build new vehicles without AM radio after pressure from lawmakers.
CEO Jim Farley wrote in posts on Twitter and LinkedIn Tuesday that AM radio will be included on a… [+2898 chars]

articles.description: Although the release of the iPhone 15 family is a few months away, a sneak peek, along with the iPhone 16 Pro Max, has surfaced online.
